author: markt
msg: Another small step towards SocketWrapper for NIO

author: markt
msg: Start moving the NIO connectors towards using SocketWrapper<NioChannel> rather than NioChannel to align them with BIO/APR and permit further refactoring.
Do this in small steps since when I tried to do it in one hit, everything broke.

author: davisp
msg: Fix spurious declarations of new merge conflicts
This patch also adds extra tests of the key tree merging logic as well
as edoc-formatted documentation for the module and a few of the merge
Thanks Paul Davis, Bob Dionne, Klaus Trainer.
